CYCLING TO THE BEAT

Turning indoor cycling into a party.
Don't stop won't stop the beat.

BOOK A BIKE
 

About Beat Cycle

We take you on a high-energy 45-minute ride taught by inspiration-inducing BEAT CYCLE instructors armed with music mixes that keep people moving and legs and hearts pumping.

Come get your sweat on with us, to the beat, on a high octane, calorie burning, obsession-producing journey that will leave you wrung out, exhilarated, and looking forward to your next ride!

Meet Our Instructors

The Team

We're Hiring


Instructor auditions are being held on a rolling basis. If you're interested in becoming a Beat Cycle Instructor, send us your resume and a sample playlist at info@beatcycle.com. We are also hiring Front Desk and Back of the House Team Members. Email us at info@beatcycle.com to get an application or more information.

Featured Instructor

Sarah G.
Instructor
Sarah G. is originally from Florida, Washington DC, and NYC (sheâ€™s moved around a lot). Boulder is now her home that she gratefully shares with Prairie Dogs instead of Subway Rats. Her husband tells her that she should have been a weather girl because when she is not in the studio you can find her staring at the radar app on her phone praying for a good storm.

Tell us a secret? I own the same 50 lululemon tanks in different colors
Favorite Food: Cheese Burgers and French Fries
Favorite move on the bike? Chest Press with a little Tap Back.
What I'm listening to: Daughtry - Long Live Rock & Roll
